history.proof: intros. qsimpl time: 2 use: Coreflexive. unfold Coreflexive. intros H3. qsimpl time: 2 use: Coreflexive. qsimpl time: 2 use: Coreflexive. qsimpl time: 2 use: Coreflexive. qsimpl time: 2 use: Coreflexive. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros A R1 R2 H1 H2 x y H.
intros A' R1 R2 H1 H2 x y H.
intros A' R1' R2 H1 H2 x y H.
intros A' R1' R2' H1 H2 x y H.

original: intros A R1 R2 H1 H2 x y H. unfold Coreflexive in H1, H2. unfold Coreflexive. intros H3. destruct H3 as [H3 | H3]. - apply H1 in H3. rewrite -> H3. reflexivity. - apply H2 in H3. rewrite -> H3. reflexivity.
